content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `ispersonal` that returns a trait if the provided Vehicle type is a personal vehicle for everyday driving. All vehicles are subtypes of AbstractVehicle. Function must work for types: Car, Motorcycle, Bus, Truck. The first two should return true, the latter two should return false . The function should default to false for any other subtype of AbstractVehicle. Provide an example.

```julia
abstract type AbstractVehicle end

struct Car <: AbstractVehicle
    model::String
end

struct Motorcycle <: AbstractVehicle
    brand::String
end

struct Bus <: AbstractVehicle
    capacity::Int
end

struct Truck <: AbstractVehicle
    tonnage::Float64
end

ispersonal(x::Car) = true
ispersonal(x::Motorcycle) = true
ispersonal(x::AbstractVehicle) = false
ispersonal(x::Bus) = false
ispersonal(x::Truck) = false
```

Example:
```julia
car = Car("Toyota")
ispersonal(car)  # Output: true
truck = Truck(5.0)
ispersonal(truck)  # Output: false
```

### Execution Results

```plaintext
Execution has been successful (no errors detected). Consider adding 1-2 challenging unit tests to improve the main function - use `@test` macro, organize them in `@testset begin .. end` block.
```

Take a deep break. Think step-by-step and fix the above errors. I believe in you. You can do it! I also need code, actual working Julia code, no shortcuts.

```julia
abstract type AbstractVehicle end

struct Car <: AbstractVehicle
    model::String
end

struct Motorcycle <: AbstractVehicle
    brand::String
end

struct Bus <: AbstractVehicle
    capacity::Int
end

struct Truck <: AbstractVehicle
    tonnage::Float64
end

ispersonal(x::T) where T<:AbstractVehicle = T in (Car, Motorcycle)

# Unit tests
using Test
@testset begin
    @test ispersonal(Car("Toyota")) == true
    @test ispersonal(Motorcycle("Honda")) == true
    @test ispersonal(Bus(50)) == false
    @test ispersonal(Truck(5.0)) == false
    @test ispersonal(AbstractVehicle()) == false
end
```
